thread.title: Houston becomes celebrity spotting center during Super Bowl week
thread.title_full: Houston becomes celebrity spotting center during Super Bowl week

author: Heather Leighton, Houston Chronicle
title: Houston becomes celebrity spotting center during Super Bowl week
text:
ESPN reporter Erin Andrews gets her fitness in at Orangetheory Fitness in the Heights area. 
ESPN reporter Erin Andrews gets her fitness in at Orangetheory Fitness in the Heights area. Photo: Reader Photo Submission 
"Supernatural" star Jared Padalecki poses with fan at Doc Holiday on Saturday, Jan. 28. 
"Supernatural" star Jared Padalecki poses with fan at Doc Holiday on Saturday, Jan. 28. Photo: Reader Photo Submission 
Adrian Peterson (center) poses with fans at the Giuseppe Zanotti event in River Oaks. 
Adrian Peterson (center) poses with fans at the Giuseppe Zanotti event in River Oaks. Photo: Reader Photo Submission Image 4 of 28 
Comedian Craig Gass (right) was seen with fan (Houston Chronicle's Craig Hlavaty) at Minute Maid Park during Super Bowl Opening Night on Monday, Jan. 30. 
Comedian Craig Gass (right) was seen with fan (Houston Chronicle's Craig Hlavaty) at Minute Maid Park during Super Bowl Opening Night on Monday, Jan. 30. Photo: Reader Photo Submission Image 5 of 28 
"Good Burger" actor Kel Mitchell was asking fans and stars questions during the Super Bowl Opening Night at Minute Maid Park. 
"Good Burger" actor Kel Mitchell was asking fans and stars questions during the Super Bowl Opening Night at Minute Maid Park. Photo: Reader Photo Submission Image 6 of 28 
LaDainian Tomlinson interviews Patriots player Jimmy Garoppolo during the Super Bowl Opening Night at Minute Maid Park. 
LaDainian Tomlinson interviews Patriots player Jimmy Garoppolo during the Super Bowl Opening Night at Minute Maid Park. Photo: Reader Photo Submission 
ESPN's Sal Paolantonio interviews Falcons QB Matt Ryan during the Super Bowl Opening Night. 
ESPN's Sal Paolantonio interviews Falcons QB Matt Ryan during the Super Bowl Opening Night. Photo: Reader Photo Submission 
Deion Sanders announces a play-by-play of the Madden game between Martellus Bennett and Vic Beasley. 
Deion Sanders announces a play-by-play of the Madden game between Martellus Bennett and Vic Beasley. Photo: Reader Photo Submission
